committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to ratify an exchange agreement concerning National Wildlife Refuge System lands located on Matagorda Island in Texas.

summary.text: Ratifies an exchange agreement providing for management of National Wildlife Refuge System lands and State park lands on Matagorda Island in Texas.

titles.title: A bill to ratify an exchange agreement concerning National Wildlife Refuge System lands located on Matagorda Island in Texas.
